mapper.select: select b.*,c.name from (select * from tb_biller where bcreate =#{bcreate} )b left join tb_group g on b.group_id = g.group_id left join tb_company c on g.company_id = c.company_id

select b.*,c.name from tb_biller b ,tb_group g,tb_company c where b.group_id=g.group_id and g.company_id = c.company_id and b.bstate=#{bstate}
